mapper.insert: insert into tb_content (character_seq, category_seq, content_text, content_is_public, content_is_media, content_created_date) values (#{characterSeq}, #{categorySeq}, #{contentText}, #{contentIsPublic}, #{contentIsMedia}, now())
mapper.update:
update tb_content set content_text = #{contentText},
content_is_public = #{contentIsPublic},
content_is_media = #{contentIsMedia},
content_modified_date = now() where content_seq = #{contentSeq}
mapper.select: select content_seq as contentSeq, content_is_active as contentIsActive, content_is_public as contentIsPublic, character_seq as characterSeq, category_seq as categorySeq, content_text as contentText, content_like as contentLike, content_save as contentSave, content_is_media as contentIsMedia, content_created_date contentCreatedDate, content_modified_Date as contentModifiedDate, (select count(*) from tb_content_like where content_seq = #{contentSeq} and character_seq = #{characterNow}) as contentIsLike from tb_content where content_seq = #{contentSeq}

select content_seq as contentSeq, content_is_active as contentIsActive, content_is_public as contentIsPublic, character_seq as characterSeq, category_seq as categorySeq, content_text as contentText, content_like as contentLike, content_save as contentSave, content_is_media as contentIsMedia, content_created_date contentCreatedDate, content_modified_Date as contentModifiedDate, (select count(*) from tb_content_like where content_seq = tb_content.content_Seq and character_seq = #{characterNow}) as contentIsLike from tb_content where category_seq IN (select category_seq from tb_character where character_seq = #{characterNow})
